Articles.Content:
Hey all, I'm new to KSP and love it! Been following Scott Manley's tips on Youtube and managed to get to Duna today. But unfortunately the landing was a bit rough and I destroyed 2 engines and I'm almost out of fuel so it looks like my Kerbals are staying there!

![rj00mo.jpg](http://i62.tinypic.com/rj00mo.jpg)

Welcome aboard! That's quite an accomplishment- I've only ever landed on Duna once before... 

You're going to fit right in here ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Welcome aboard- Any landing you can walk away from is a good landing!
Congrats on Duna! I've never been there on my own. And welcome!
